abstract: Mayor Michael R Bloomberg announces program meant to reduce repeated instances of traffic-snarling roadwork in New York City by improving coordination among utility companies, contractors and city agencies.
snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg announced a program meant to reduce repeated road work with coordination among utilities, contractors and city agencies.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg announced a program meant to reduce repeated road work with coordination among utilities, contractors and city agencies.

headline.main: City Aims for Teamwork to End Dig-Pave-Dig Cycle on Roads
headline.print_headline: City Aims for Teamwork to End Dig-Pave-Dig Cycle on Roads
headline.seo: Digital System in New York Is Meant to Coordinate Road Work
